applications.name: 星际迷航
applications.description: 备受好评的科幻电影，星际迷航官方授权的模拟经营作品，像素画风很有特点哦，你需要不断的招兵买马，让自己的飞船等级越来越高，拥有更多科技设备，探索宇宙空间，发现各个星球，将隐藏在内的危机逐一化解，好好开动脑筋吧！
applications.releaseNotes:
Incoming 1.5 update from Starfleet:

Star Trek Trexel's largest update so far!

* All new content from STAR TREK: THE NEXT GENERATION! Officers, missions, guest stars, and the iconic ship hull are all ready to be unlocked!
* Strategically target enemies and heal allies in the completely redesigned tactical combat scenarios!
* Quark has found his way into the Trexelian Expanse! Once you reach Level 3, visit Quark's Trexelian Video Emporium for a refresh on the Ferengi Rules of Acquisition and strike a "profitable" deal!
* The Holodeck unlocks in multiple ways, and now allows you to replay entire missions and relive stories from beginning to end!
* Use the ship's all new Gallery to share images of your ship's construction with friends, and to collect exclusive images based on iconic scenes from the series!
* Enlist friends to form your own Fleet, and bolster your strength to increase your daily rewards!
* And because no Federation starship would be complete without it... doors between rooms now "swoosh"!
* ...and many more great performance and bug fixes!

If you have any problems or feedback, please contact us through the game’s Menu button, or via the YesGnome website:
http://yesgno.me/

Thank you for all of the support! We look forward to continuing to refine and expand your Trexels experience!

applications.name: 巴比伦双子历险记
applications.description:
The universal version of the best retro puzzle platformer on iOS! Guide the twin princes of Babylonian to solve challenging puzzles and find hidden historic treasures in a beautifully reconstructed ancient Iraq. A fascinating development story that started on the Commodore Amiga in Baghdad in 1993: http://www.babyloniantwins.com/background

★★ PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS VERSION HAS NO ADS. YOU CAN COLLECT GOLDEN COINS FROM WITHIN THE GAME AND/OR PURCHASE THEM WITH REAL MONEY ★★

No #1 overall app in Germany

No #2 overall app in China

Top 10 over all game in US, UK, France, Spain, Singapore, Korea, Canada, Nederland, Japan, Russia, Italy and many others.

★★ Featured along with Angry Birds and other top games in the new book: "Buttonless: Incredible iPhone and iPad Games and the Stories Behind Them" ★★

TOUCHARCADE: Platformer of the Year - 4.5/5

APPLE: "Great Platformers"

GAMEPRO: Top 25 iPad Games - 4.5/5

POCKETGAMER: Silver Award - 8/10

PC MAGAZINE: Top 20 iPad Games

APPOLICIOUS/YAHOO GAMES: Best Family Fun Game for 2010 along with Angry Birds (iPad)

Also featured on AOL News, Kotaku, GamePro, Eurogamer, Wired.com, Arstechnica, The Independent & The Vancouver Sun

----------------------------

Solve difficult puzzles and find hidden treasures in one of iOS most challenging puzzle platformers. Babylonian Twins takes you to 576 BC in ancient Mesopotamia with beautifully reconstructed historic environments, authentic original Iraqi music and innovative two-character control.

A fascinating 17-year development story starting on the Commodore Amiga in Baghdad. http://www.babyloniantwins.com/background


----------------------------

USER REVIEWS

- "Thank you for giving your players credit, this game is from an era when game designers did't care if you could beat their game" - US AppStore


- "Thank you for giving your players credit, this game is from an era when game designers did't care if you could beat their game" - US AppStore

- "Appreciate the effort that went into drawing an authentic Babylon city, down to the blue bricks of the Ishtar Gate"

- "All 3 of my teenage daughters fight to have possession of my iphone just because of this game! luckily can say no- Mom is playing it. Challenging, yet fun"



----------------------------

PROFESSIONAL CRITICS


"A challenging, explorative platformer that respects its players and refuses to hold you by the hand"
- TOUCHARCADE

"Fantastic head-scratching puzzles"
-GAMEPRO

"Charming and demanding in equal measure, reminds us what was so good about 16-bit gaming""
- POCKETGAMER

"A proud member of Mensa"
- 148APPS.COM

"Top marks level design, superb challenges that provide a true test of your platforming mettle"
- EUROGAMER

"A gorgeous, charming platformer with one of the most interesting backstories"
- C-NET



----------------------------

THE GAME

Take control of the twin princes of Babylon in their quest to restore peace in the city. Enjoy days and weeks of exploration and mind-twisting puzzles in ancient Iraq


✔ Guide two characters to solve puzzles in unique co-operative tag-team control

✔Over a Dozen Huge Levels across Five Worlds including:
- Tower of Babel
- The Assyrian Place
- The Procession Street
- The Hanging Gardens of Babylon)

✔Super Crisp Retina Graphics

✔An Album Worth of Original Authentic Iraqi Music

✔A Detailed Reconstruction of Ancient Mesopotamia derived from Authentic History texts

✔Super Smooth Scrolling at 60fps

✔Game Center & OpenFeint Leaderboards & Achievements

✔Secret Treasures and Bonus Levels


----------------------------

Follow us on Twitter @cosmosapps & Facebook: http://facebook.com/babyloniantwins for tips, support and special offers.

Produced by Cosmos Interactive Inc. with the financial participation of Telefilm Canada.
www.babyloniantwins.com

applications.name: 拳击手养成记
applications.description:
This is a board game on the theme of the boxing gym in Japan.
Each time, Various boxers visit your gym.
Second job is to make the practice your boxer, and to support him to grab the glory.
In the bout, please instruction (tap) to depending on the situation.

Can you grow a world champion within 15 laps ? only the dice knows it !

Bout
Instructions to the boxer is the only easy operation of tap
★★★★★ : Devoted to recovery
☆★★★★ : jab and watching the opponent
☆☆★★★ : To start the attack hitting jab, and one-two !
☆☆☆★★ : Damage to the opponent hit one-two, a body blow
☆☆☆☆★ : will aim to the KO by strong hook or upper.
☆☆☆☆☆ : will aim to the KO by strong rush and finish.
(Increase in the number of stars, the more consumption of stamina.)

Press and hold the screen (long tap) : Star level back to 0.

Feature
・Over 200 Boxer is appeared.
・if boxer Retired, next time they are appeared as a opponent characters.

Parameters of the boxer
Life : In the bout, it will affect the parameter of all. Can not be out of this when there are no more stamina, a punch or guard.
Power : affect the damage to the opponent
Speed : affect the hit rate of punch.
Toughness : affect the damage by the punch.
Technique : affect the success rate of defense.

applications.name: 贫穷的格斗士
applications.description:
Defeat 'Debt', the Lord of fear, and become a legendary gladiator!


Game Features :
Free!
Not a Clone!
Creditor simulator!
Most fights proceed automatically! All you have to do is use skills or raise your stats!


You probably didn't read the game explanation closely but,
If you've read up to this point, download the game!


How To:
Accumulate money to pay off your debts.
You must repay a certain amount of debt every thirty seconds.
Repayment will proceed automatically if you have enough money.
But you can further pay off the debts by pressing the button.

Use the money left to increase power.
Strong power will let you fight at a higher league.
It will help you earn more money.

Repay all your debts and become a free man!

applications.name: 神之符印
applications.description:
Sigils of Elohim is a free mini-game prelude to Croteam’s upcoming first-person puzzler The Talos Principle that challenges players to solve dozens of formidable sigil puzzles under the watchful eye of Elohim. Subjects are tasked with deciphering a series of puzzle sets by rotating and placing the sigil shapes within the board in an effort to unlock helpful items and relics within The Talos Principle.
Features

Unravel the secrets of Elohim by completing nearly a hundred sigil puzzles as Sigils of Elohim is updated with new puzzle sets leading up to the launch of The Talos Principle.

Acquire items and relics in Sigils of Elohim that transfer over to the console and PC versions of The Talos Principle.

About The Talos Principle
The Talos Principle is a philosophical first-person puzzle game from Croteam, the creators of the Serious Sam series, and written by Tom Jubert (FTL, The Swapper) and Jonas Kyratzes (Infinite Ocean). Assume the role of a sentient artificial intelligence placed within a simulation of humanity’s greatest ruins and linked together through an arcane cathedral. Players are tasked with solving a series of increasingly complex puzzles woven into a metaphysical parable about intelligence and meaning in an inevitably doomed world.
applications.releaseNotes: Fixed issue of rescaling level selection screen on iOS 8.

applications.name: 骷髅联盟
applications.description:
用塔自我保卫，射出强弓，不要让骷髅战士越过战线！
经典塔防的辉煌演变，第一人称射手和角色扮演元素相结合，战略和行动是您以前从未体验过的。
用神弓、具有独特力量的战斗护腕、箭和梦幻般的魔法药水武装自己。
坚守阵地，防御骷髅战士的攻击。
进入战场射击，借助于专门的塔和封锁线定制防御策略。
令人难以置信的3D图形，进入一个梦幻般的史诗世界。
根据每场战斗中将要面对的敌人选择理想的塔楼和武器，不要让敌军越线。
如果您具有英雄气质，这里将为您提供机会来证明自己！
特点
• 24个游戏场景将带领您从荒凉的坟场和潮湿的沼泽地进入敌军驻扎的古代遗址和烧焦的土地。
• 15种不同的骷髅战士。与古凯尔特人、罗马军团、海盗和武士战斗……每个人都具有独特的能力。
• 6种防塔，3级专业水平和封锁线，如路障和爆炸桶等。
• 暗之书，包含可以在游戏中使用的各种骷髅战士、防塔、弓箭、魔法箭、战斗护腕和药水等全部信息。
• 壮观的高清3D图形，毫无疑问，您将沉浸在战斗中。
• 有超过25枚勋章，通过展示您消灭骷髅的技能来解锁。
• 一个百宝箱，每次通过一个场景和升级时都会获得一个。您一定已经获得过百宝箱了！
• 2个难度级别：菜鸟和铁杆。
• 精湛的原创电影配乐。
如果您喜欢塔防游戏并喜欢动作类的，毫无疑问，骷髅传说非常适合您。
游戏里面没有需要您购买的东西，您可以玩遍所有的场景。
进入游戏预告片：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xTNsy_UDFsg
applications.releaseNotes:
全新游戏模式Legend（传奇）：
-更有挑战性的情节。
-试用历来战局中所获得的武器。
-仅适合有一定经验的玩家。
更高效率。

applications.name: 肾上腺素狂飙:迈阿密风云
applications.description:
Let's ride, let's boogie, get funky!

Hit the road in the most groovy car chase ever. Buckle up, feel the sun of Miami and enjoy the ride!

Let the groove get in and play as Ray Carlton, a driver who likes to push around cops. Visit the garage, pimp your car or buy a new one and show everyone who's got the saturday night fever!

Drive at high speed by tapping left/right or by tilting your device and rush as far as possible. Speed through traffic, take down other cars and use power-ups to leave the cops behind.

If you are skilled enough and manage to reach the Coin Rush by realizing a big take down combo, you'll have the time of your life! But watch out for trucks and oil leaks.. you don't want to mess up your hair (man... these things take time).

Anyway, shut up and drive!

applications.name: 真实射击 2
applications.description:
• 在世界各地顶级的第五个游戏特色 •

参加这个进化的第一人称射击游戏. 面对你的朋友，你的敌人，或任何人在世界上的第一个虚拟现实射击场！

参加逾35万的玩家和发现为什么游戏像 "Guncrafter" 和 "Basketball Showdown" 已被 "Apple," "AppAdvice" 和 "TouchArcade" 赞扬了。

"The closest experience you can have to the actual thrill of being out on the range." - Sgt. Jeremy A. (USMC), 特殊武器和战术教官

即将推出
更新的新模式和其他的惊喜。

呼叫所有神枪手!
• 虚拟现实控制，让您使用您的电子设备成一个瞄准器.
• 头对头多人连线在 "GameCenter"
• 支持所有设备
• 基于物理的射击挑战同可破坏目标
• 磨练自己的技能在我们射击场
• 高分榜和成就
• 解锁的枪和武器

applications.name: 不要碰手机
applications.description:
Don't move your phone. You'll get points for every second your phone doesn't move.

Did you move your phone? 
The movement bar at the bottom of the screen will change color from green to red. But, more importantly, the rate at which you receive points decreases.

Challenge others!
By reaching the highest amount of points. Or be different and try to keep your score at the same number for as long as possible!
applications.releaseNotes: We've fixed some minor flaws and improved user experience for you!

applications.name: 一起玩扑克吧
applications.description:
"Poker PLAY! is a fun little puzzle game with a challenging poker theme that will appeal to anyone, even if you don’t like poker." - AppAdvice

"This isn't your bog-standard Poker app, it's actually a puzzle game with a poker theme." - Gizmodo

Find the best hands! Score the most points! Climb to the top! Poker PLAY! is the newest twist on your favorite card game.

Swipe to connect 5 cards on the board and make the best poker hand you can. Royal flushes, full houses and all the others are waiting for you in this clever puzzle game. Score big to level up and earn more chances. You only have so many so make them count!

Do you have what it takes to compete? Test your skills in Poker PLAY!

Features:
• Clever combination of puzzle and poker gameplay
• Shuffle the board to get new card combinations
• Compete against friends and share your high scores
